MAIN_MESSAGE: It will been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown for safety in the WA14 postcode areas of Bollington and Little Bollington following the imminent flooding of our substation. This may affect the supply to your property. Our engineers are on site and we will update this message as and when we get additional information from site. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 4:44PM on 20 January 2021.
